materials, such as piezoelectric ceramics, polyvinylidene ﬂuoride (PVDF), quartz crystal, etc.
However, quartz crystal has the advantages of stable piezoelectric performance, high mechanical
strength, and high insulation impedance, and is commonly used as the sensitive unit of piezoelectric

]. Since the effect of the diaphragmon the quartz crystal can be equivalent to a pressure,

. The ﬁnite element type of the model was selected as Solid 5.
